TopicTitle: GUI Textures on some addons not showing...

Articles.Content:
First Images the botton to open up the ISAMap is missing, but if you click where its supposed to be it opens.

The subassembly addon image is just a "?" if it shows up at all, but the 'button' works.

ISA Map not showing all information or buttons

Funny two of the issues are with ISAMAPPER but it happen before I installed it.

Any ideas?

These are all known issues with these mods since .20. Check the ISA MapSat Development blog for updates to the alpha plugin, and post your issues there so they can get fixed.

There is also a new subassembly manager, which is community supported, and may or may not have full working features yet.
